DOC.brief_summary: A Phase IV , Open Label , Randomized , Two-way Crossover , Single Dose Study Determine Relative Bioavailability Alprazolam 0,75mg/ml ( laboratórios Pfizer Ltda ) Oral Solution-drops Form , Versus Frontal® 0,25mg ( laboratórios Pfizer Ltda ) , Tablets Form , Under Fasted Conditions Healthy Volunteers .
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Of A New Alprazolam Dropped Formulation Versus Alprazolam Tablets
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) The BMI Body Mass Index volunteer within range 18,5 24,9 ( Dietary Guidelines Americans ) may vary 15 % due upper limit ( 18,5 28,63 ) total body weight > 50kg An informed consent document sign date subject legally acceptable representative . If subject and/or legally acceptable representative read , informed consent document may sign impartial witness Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) A history suicidal thought , behavior suicide attempt Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) Known hypersensitivity alprazolam component product History sensitivity heparin heparininduced thrombocytopenia A positive bHCG exam woman Subjects myasthenia gravis acute narrow angle glaucoma
